author: chunqingchen
body:
Fix issue #2653

Summary of the issue:
------------------------
Under Unix system, get-help would not support wildcast pattern such as about*

Root cause of the issue:
--------------------------
Under unix, GetFiles() is using filePath.IndexOf() to search string pattern, this api actually doesn't support pattern.

Fix:
---
Use regex expression to match *, ? if the search string contains such wildcast.  which are the only two cases are supported.

comments.body:
@chunqingchen The PR title and body should not be a copy of the issue. Please update the PR title and body based on the [contribution.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request-submission).

**General Guidelines**

1. Use a meaningful title for the PR to describe what is changed in this PR.
   - Do not include issue number in the title. Put it in the description instead, like "Fix #5".
   - Do not use the issue title as the PR title.
     An issue title is to briefly describe what went wrong, while a PR title is to briefly describe what is changed.
1. The PR body shall provide an additional summary of what/why went wrong and how it's fixed in the PR description.
    - An example: https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/pull/19988
